title: 启动游戏正常，进入游戏地图后就崩溃
txt_content:
[23:06:50] [song's skull/INFO] [STDOUT]: [customskinloader.Logger:log:70]: [song's skull INFO] song's profile loaded.
[23:06:50] [song's skull/INFO] [STDOUT]: [customskinloader.Logger:log:70]: [song's skull INFO] (SkinUrl: http://textures.minecraft.net/te ... 1d9e0ddeded8d3a5797 , Model: default , CapeUrl: null  , Expiry: 1579619245)
[23:06:50] [Server thread/INFO] [minecraft/MinecraftServer]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Storage Cell
[23:06:50] [Client thread/INFO] [minecraft/AdvancementList]: Loaded 22 advancements
[23:06:50] [Client thread/INFO] [minecraft/GuiNewChat]: [CHAT] §6The mod Extra Cells 2 is supporting In-Game Wiki mod. §6However, In-Game Wiki isn't installed! [Download Latest]
[23:06:51] [Server thread/WARN] [minecraft/MinecraftServer]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 5482ms behind, skipping 109 tick(s)
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00000000647078e4, pid=1556, tid=0x0000000000000a98
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_241-b07) (build 1.8.0_241-b07)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.241-b07 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [nvoglv64.DLL+0x7378e4]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# D:\我的世界\Minecraft 1.12.2 - 璀璨星云\Minecraft 1.12.2 - 璀璨星云\.minecraft\hs_err_pid1556.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed


启动游戏正常，进入游戏地图后就崩溃，大佬们，这个是什么问题呀！！！

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
642662256 发表于 2020-1-22 00:55
大佬，附件上传了，拜托啦！整一个晚上了，呜呜呜




file_1579647870000.jpg (241.25 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-1-22 07:04 上传






根据出错线程的调用关系来看，应该是你正在用的小地图出现问题。先试试更新显卡驱动，如果无论如何都无法解决，那倒有可能表明该小地图不很兼容你的显卡，这时可以更新小地图或者更换为其他小地图。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
尝试更新下显卡驱动。

然后多分配一点内存

xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-21 23:45
尝试更新下显卡驱动。

然后多分配一点内存
已经分配了6000了
